caption.title: Map of the African continent containing projection of the tree and uncertainty for Cauchy-distributed random walk diffusion.
caption.p: The inferred phylogeny is projected along a time gradient, with mean root location and results of the diffusion analysis. Colored polygon surfaces represent 80% HPD uncertainty for the location of estimated nodes, using Cauchy-distributed diffusion rates for ten equal time intervals along the length of the tree. Polygons are overlaid with a maximum entropy raster considering the presence of Aedes africanus on the African continent.
